properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 4 at 3:27AM CST until February 5 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Dodge City KS
properties.description:
...Wintry precipitation expected Today...

* WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Snow accumulations under two inches
and minor ice accumulations possible.

* WHERE...Hodgeman, Pawnee, Stafford and Edwards Counties.

* WHEN...From midnight tonight to midnight CST Tuesday night.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing
snow will reduce visibility, especially in open areas.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Degraded travel conditions are expected
during the Tuesday morning commute.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT
